net.hudup.core.data

Class ItemRating

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.data.RatingVector
      • net.hudup.core.data.ItemRating
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, TextParsable

    public class ItemRating
extends RatingVector
    This class extending the RatingVector class represents a item rating vector that contains all ratings of many users on the same item and so the internal variable RatingVector.id is item identification (item ID). The internal map contains all ratings of this item rating vector. Each entry of this map has a key and a value. Value is rating represented by Rating class and key is user identification (user ID). As a convention, such key is called field id which is user id, exactly.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • ItemRating

        public ItemRating(boolean sequence)
        Constructor with the additional parameter sequence. If this parameter sequence of is true then, the internal variable RatingVector.ratedMap containing all ratings will have built-in mechanism of sequence as a list.
        Parameters:
        sequence - additional parameter guiding how to create the internal variable RatingVector.ratedMap. If it is true then, such internal variable containing all ratings will have built-in mechanism of sequence as a list.

      • ItemRating

        public ItemRating(int itemId,
                  boolean sequence)
        Constructor with item ID and additional parameter sequence. If this parameter sequence of is true then, the internal variable RatingVector.ratedMap containing all ratings will have built-in mechanism of sequence as a list.
        Parameters:
        itemId - specified item ID.
        sequence - additional parameter guiding how to create the internal variable RatingVector.ratedMap. If it is true then, such internal variable containing all ratings will have built-in mechanism of sequence as a list.
